A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Filled with plot holes\, didn't explain anything we didn't already know\, had way too much comedy and was a very bad plot. I'd say the prequils are 100% better then this. I hope all you \"critics\" are viewing this\, stop looking at this movie as a Broadway show with deeper meaning\, or a show with flashy cgi. Start watching it as an actual sit down with your friends\, grab your popcorn movie. Let's be honest Disney didn't just kill the horse with this\, they chopped it up\, threw it in the burger mix and expect us to keep eating.
